151.content:
The Sun was rising over the valley that overlooked the stationary Myouren Temple, and things were occurring as they had always done; Ichirin & Unzan were the first ones up, clearing the sky around the temple so that the rays of sunlight could shine freely. Shortly after, the leader of the Temple and the Buddhists that inhabited it, the Magician Byakuren Hijiri awakens, ready to brew tea and wake the rest of her disciples.

The first needing to woken up was the temple's "captain", Minamitsu Murasa. Byakuren "nudged" the ghostly captain awake and by nudge, I mean Byakuren shoved her foot against Murasa too hard, sliding her still sleeping body halfway across the brine soaked wooden floor, crashing into the wall. Despite being her leader, Byakuren could not help but profusely apologize. As always, Byakuren didn't bother going into Shou's room, one because even she didn't like to wake the tiger youkai and two, because she knew Shou's servant and overall caretaker Nazrin would wake her anyway.

Next came Nue, the...Nue, who was still sleeping on a cloud, her bed somehow avoiding clearance by Ichirin & Unzan earlier, likely by making the cloud unidentifiable. She could not, however, avoid the small furry alarm clock that was Kyoukou Kasodani, who on Byakuren's request, shouted towards the sky, knocking Nue off her cloud bed and plummeting onto the temple grounds. Unintentionally, Kyoukou's screech also knocks the mischievous Kogasa Tatara off the cloud...Kogasa, while not a permanent Resident at the Temple, visited often, mostly to get cheap scares out of other visitors.

And last but not least, there was the venerated Bandanuki Mamizou Futatsuiwa, who has been awake long since the sun set yesterday. She watches all the typical morning commotion and goings on of the Temple from atop a nearby hillside, drinking the finest of Sake from her gourd. Because while she wasn't officially allied with the Myouren Temple, she still cared for those residing there, knowing that its grounds were always a safe haven for wayward Youkai still adjusting to life in Gensokyo, which there was never a short supply of. She also drank on the hillside out of respect for Byakuren as a friend, knowing that drinking the large container of alcohol while Byakuren was attempting to teach Buddhist values would make her uncomfortable, as strict Buddhism forbade drinking. Not that Mamizou was complaining, because as all Tanuki do, young or old, day or night, she loved a good drink!

Whether it was due to her advanced age or her drinking habits, no one could deny that in her undisguised form, Mamizou Futatsuiwa was a fairly mature woman. While her face was still thin, her breasts were practically the size of cantaloupes, always threatening to slip out of the confines of her beige cotton shirt. Not that such an occurrence would embarrass Mamizou...Tanuki do not get embarrassed. In fact, she was quite proud of her large chest, because to female Tanuki an especially large chest was a sign of great power and wisdom, just as testicles were to Male Tanuki.

Going further down, Mamizou's arms were still in decent form, a minor layer of plush surrounding them. Her belly, however, was adding just the right amount of curvature to her midsection, her large chest riding her shirt up, allowing her stomach to be shown to the world. Further south still, her hips were wide and alive, rhythmically moving side to side anywhere she walked...which is why, when she was out of a disguise, Mamizou fly most of the time. And although you could hardly ever see them, as they were typically crossed against one another and resting on a flat surface, the Tanuki's thighs and buttocks were just as plump and magnificent as everywhere else. Yes, Mamizou was quite...the mature women.

Mature in both body and mind, as even in times of crisis and confusion, like the Incidents she's been involved in. Mamizou always kept a calm mind about things, typically cleaning up after everyone else's attempts to solve things, often made them worse. Yes, Mamizou was a voice of reason in Gensokyo, especially to the Idiot Shrine Maiden. But even with all of her years of wisdom, Mamizou could never keep a cool head when she ran out of alcohol...which was about to happen in 3...2...1!

Taking a sip from her gourd, Mamizou was expecting more delicious sake to pour into her mouth as it had always done...but she felt a lone drop hit her tongue. Opening her eyes, she peered into the spout of the gourd, finding only darkness...and another drop, which promptly landed on the lens of her spectacles. Wiping the lens and shaking her head, Mamizou got herself together. "Okey then...so I'm outta drink. That's fine, no really...it's fine. Been through a dry spell a'for, nothin I can do...", Mamizou thought...

"THIS IS NOT FINE!, she shouted into the sky. While no where near the volume of a normal vocalization from Kyoukou, the outburst was still enough scare the birds surrounding the Temple and draw the attention of those in the Temple Courtyard. Ichirin, Kyoukou, Shou, Nazrin, along with many other minor residents, turned their heads towards the source of the yell as it disturbed the silence of their daily sweeping.

"Arrgh, for all the...blasted fish in the waves! Arrrrrgh!", Mamizou continued the shout. "Alright, alright. So, this is the first time I've run outta of drink since moving to the this wacky realm...Alright, think ol' girl, THINK. Where can I...acquire a large amount of drink?"

She knew her way around Gensokyo, having been all over, in and out of disguise. But with all her wisdom, she'd never been faced with this situation before...she didn't know where to get booze. Then it hit her...As much as they didn't like each other's company, Mamizou knew there was one person who knew where to find things anywhere in the realm. The Idiot Shrine Maiden, Reimu Hakurei. In a frantic tizzy, Mamizou flew into the sky, the Residents were still looking in her direction. "Where's Mamizou-sama off to in such a hurry?", asked Shou. "Beats me. Doesn't matter, back to sweeping. You want Hijiri-sama to catch you slacking...again?", retorted Nazrin. "Nooooooo...", pouted Shou, resuming her duties.

Approaching the Hakurei Shrine, Mamizou landed on its steps. Walking up the steps, there was no one in the courtyard and the donation box lies empty..as always. A sad display, it was. Knocking on tatami door, it didn't open right away, though Mamizou did here the tiny voice of the Inchling Princess Sukuna shouting into the room. "Reimuuuu! Someone's at the doooo~r!" Beyond the door, she heard a faint response from the Shrine Maiden. "Ughh...what the fuck? Who knocks on the door at 9 in the morning?" She wasn't even up yet? Pathetic. But Mamizou had to withhold judgement this time if she wanted Reimu to tell her where to snag some booze. Sliding the door open, Reimu seeing Mamizou standing in the doorway, smiling brightly. "Wha-God damn it. As if Yukari bothering me every other day wasn't enough, no I got you...what am I, a hag magnet? Ugh, what do you want?" "Hehe..mornin' to you too, Hakurei. So...I'm just gonna get to the point. I am in a bit of a pickle. And I know yeh aren't fond o' me, but iffen me get out outta this pickle, I'll....owe...you...one." Mamizou had to grit her teeth for that last part. She never liked being indebted to anyone, no Tanuki did.

Reimu let out a tired, shaky laugh. "Ehe..ehehe...heeeee! You?! You need help? You, the wise confident old Bandanuki needs help from me? Eheeeehehe!
Oh, how the shoe had turned!" Mamizou was becoming frustrated now...She took her gourd off her belt and held it down, demonstrating its emptiness. This got Reimu to stop laughing for a moment..."Alright look...normally, I would never ask for yer help. I don't like you and you don't like me...but ya see this? I'm dry...and this is the 1st time that I've ran dry since I got to this place. I don't know where to get any more and I figured you do. So spit it out! Where do I get more?"

After that point, the details of where Mamizou went next that day are fuzzy. She remembers someone giving her an inkling or a lead. It went something like...
151.title: Youkai sure love their Booze...Until it runs out!

The Hakurei Shrine Maiden stared blankly at Mamizou for seemed like an eternity. An unamused expression formed on her young face.

"You know what, Futatsuiwa? Please. Go to hell. They have Sake there..." Reimu at last answered, haggard disdain for the present company in her voice. She with motioned to close the Front door, but Mamizou's hand interjects before it is done

"Ay! Hold on half a moment now!" the older women objects, opening the door back up, giving Reimu a frustrated and bewildered look
"What do ye mean 'Go to Hell'...which Hell?! Yer not...are ye pullin' a jape on me right now? Cause I cannae say I'm in the mood for a jape at the moment, you little taffer!" Mamizou makes her frustration well known, crossing her arms under her substantial chest.

Reimu only yawns in response to the short lecture, rolling her eyes and sighing "Alright listen...near the Shrine, fly along the valley side and you'll find some natural hot springs. Further in and you'll see a massive hole in the ground. Fall down that hole, make your way through the tunnels as you watch out for youkai in buckets and you'll end up in Former Hell" Reimu explained tersly, rubbing her eyes. Mamizou raises an eyebrow in suspicious, but continues listening
"That's all you really need to know. Try not to die with whatever you're doing, I've already forget...Good luck, Ball Hag" Reimu rudely says, before slamming the tatami door shut a final time

Mamizou stares at the door for a moments, digesting what she was told before turning around. She uncrosses her arms as she makes her way from the Shrine, adjusting her glasses in a huff
"Well now! That's just choice, innit? The lass tells me where to go, how to get there, what I'm lookin' fer and she don't even tell which direction to go! Of all the ungrateful.." Mamizou complains as she walks along the path to shrine.

Halfway from where she landed, the wind begins to pick up, blowing her loose fitting cloth shirt up a bit. Mamizou holds onto her leaf hat, enduring the sudden gusts and gales. Eyeing the sky, she soon spots the source of the abrupt weather approaching her. A certain Tengu, smug face and camera in tow.

The bird youkai makes the stop in front of Mamizou on a dime, lowering herself down to the Ban-Tanuki's level. She spoke up first
"So...Futatsuiwa-san. Word on the winds is that you need a guide? Making your way to Former Hell on a booze run eh?" The Tengu brightly asked, oddly familiar with her predicament.

Normally Mamizou wasn't privy to Tengu asking her questions, but this one looked familiar...
"And who exactly are ye to know all this not an hour into my misadventure? Mmm...hang on" she adjusts her spectacles, having had them jostled in the strong gales
"Ah! You're that Shamimura lass, the one who was a right pain in my tuckus when I was gettin my claws in Kosuzu, the sweet little thing. Why you reckon to help me out now?"

"Slow News Day" The reporter Tengu replied bluntly with a shrug and smile
"Hmm...fair dues. Well, I haven't a reason to hang about this side of the realm much so I suppose you'll lead the way to the hole then, eh?"
"Yes indeed! Right this way, my Bandanuki Elder!" Aya chirped with a bow before turning in flight, due west"
Mamizou didn't trust Aya as far as she could throw her...but she needed a guide around this section of Gensoukyou. She simply gritted her teeth and hoped this lass didn't pull and funny business.

On the long journey for even a drop of booze, Mamizou zoned out again and when next she came to....

Before Reimu can even dignify Mamizou with a response, both of them are gifted with a mighty clatter from the back of the shrine. With perked ears, the two turn and look to the source of the noise.

From the back yard, stumbling, mumbling and always ever bumbling, came running the little Oni Suika in their direction.

Reimu, recognizing the danger of a high speed Suika, made the split second decision to tackle Mamizou to the ground, allowing Suiki to ram head first the wall, back to unconsciousness

Now on the cobblestone path, having avoided the danger, Reimu finds that in tackling Mamizou, her hands are places squarly on the Tanuki's ripe plush breasts, one hand even making its way under her cloth shirt, meeting warm flesh. Mamizou, thankful for the save but amused at the shrine maiden's gaff, teases her as they both stand up

"I....uh. S-shut up!" was all Reimu could muster from her mouth before looking over to spot her oni roommate safely conked out "Right...sorry about her."
"No worries. She's not normally that much a hellion is she?" Reimu shakes her head "Nooo, just the normal oni fair from her until recently. Last Sestubun, Sakuya shared some of this 'Red Wine' stuff and since then Suika can't get enough of the stuff. It really gives her a different kind of drunk than Sake does. Though it takes more of it to get her blitz...but with her bottomless gourd and all..."
Reimu trails off and the two look back at the unconscious little Oni.

Mamizou's eyebrows raise a little as the position Suika had landed on the wall was exposing her stomach, which lay out wide and soft against her lap. Her short legs were encased in plush fat and, as miraculous as it seemed, average sized breasts had been developed on Suika's chest. All from the result mass consumption of this 'Red Wine' type of booze.

"Goodness gracious...Red Wine ye say? Who was it that gave it to the short lass o'yers?"
"Oh, uh, Sakuya. The Maid over at the Scarlet Devil Mansion, just north of the Human Village. There's a big-ass lake right before it so you can't really miss it."
"Scarlet Devils, eh? Noted" Mamizou said with smile. She nodded to Reimu, thanking her for the information and the save and made her way to the Misty Lake and towards the SDM

Other than a few tripe fairies and a mermaid who was rather persistent to have a meaningful conversation, the Lake proved an easy fly over
Now at the large ornate metal gates to this mansion, however, Mamizou stood in front of a more formidable foe. A statuesque women, clad in green with fiery red hair. Gown adorned with Chinese characters, an intensely muscular build, legs that went on forever and chi signature that indicated to Mamizou that the women was in actuality a rare Half-Dragon.

Such an interesting obstacle Mamizou found herself before...it was a shame that this unique obstacle was stood up straight, dead asleep. Her position in front of the gate spelled that she was a guard for would be intruders. Like Mamizou might be considered.

The old gal thought to herself...should she play this smart and just fly up and past this scaly stunner or should she take the time to make some mischief? A sleeping target almost seemed too easy...

info.brief_description: The girls of Touhou Project get wrapped up in some strange things, but none like this.
info.description:
General Overview

Touhou (or Touhou Project) is a series of top down shooters that takes place in the supernatural realm of "Gensokyo". There is usually no connecting plot between games and, usually, the most that's involved in every game is that various 'incidents' occur across Gensokyo and it's up to the shrine maiden, Reimu Hakurei (and her witch friend, Marisa Kirisame) to investigate and solve these incidents, all the while battling various youkai and beings with their magic and danmaku abilities. Basically, this interactive takes the usual formula of Touhou and throws in the elements of expansion to the mix. Storylines can focus on single characters or an entire group, if desired.

For information regarding the series and it's concepts -> http://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/Touhou_Wiki

Canon Characters
-Because Touhou Project has a vast amount of characters that I know can't be fully listed here without making this boring, please refer to the link below to get a good understanding of the canon characters and who they are. Not all of them will appear in the story, but feel free to add more Touhou characters to the story as you see fit. It makes things alot more interesting if you manage to pull in more characters into the situation~

Link to canon character list: http://www.touhouwiki.net/wiki/Category:Characters


+Fetishes that can appear during this story...+
- Stuffing/Weight Gain
- Pregnancy/Unbirth
- Vore


Standard rules apply...
- Only female characters are to expand. Although this doesn't exclude male characters from appearing at all in the interactive.
- Please put forth effort in your chapters.
- Nothing completely outlandish in regards of expansion.
- Let's try to avoid the overly gross situations such as toilet stuff and the like. Burps are fine (farts too, if you play it for comedy), but nothing past that please.
- This is an 18+ interactive so sexual situations are allowed, just...try not to go overboard with them. Use in moderation, basically and try not to have the story revolve too much around it and build up to the sexual things.
